content: final yarn end onto a darning needle and poke into bauble passing out the other pattern support lilykate@jolihouse com side squish bauble slightly cut end then allow @lilykatemakes | #ball-ble bauble to unsquish so the end disappears into the stuffing follow me on instagram watch my youtube channel create label using card and tape / staple and subscribe to my newsletter attach ribbon / yarn to hang copyright 2024 lily kate france for personal use only pattern & items made from pattern may not be reproduced for sale page 3 of 3 #ball-ble chart written instructions worked 3 times per round round 1 k1tbl p1 to end round 3 and all odd numbered rounds work each stitch as it presents itself - purl the purls and knit the knits through the back loop round 2 * k1tbl p1 x2 m1l k1tbl p1 x3 p2tog repeat from * twice more round 4 * k1tbl p1 x2 k1tbl m1lp k1tbl p1 x2 k1tbl p2tog repeat from * twice more round 6 * k1tbl p1 x3 m1l k1tbl p1 x2 p2tog repeat from * twice more round 8 * k1tbl p1 x3 k1tbl m1lp k1tbl p1 k1tbl p2tog repeat from * twice more round 10 *k2togtbl k1tbl p1 x3 m1l k1tbl p1 p2tog repeat from * twice more 33 sts round 12 *k2togtbl p1 k1tbl x3 m1lp k1tbl p2tog repeat from * twice more 30 sts all chart row are read from right to left round 14 *k2togtbl k1tbl p1 x3 m1l p2tog repeat from * twice more 27 sts round 16 *k2togtbl p1 k1tbl p1 x2 p2tog repeat from * twice more 21 sts legend round 17 *k2togtbl k1tbl p1 k1tbl p2tog repeat from * twice more 15 sts round 18 *k2togtbl p1 p2tog repeat from * twice more 9 sts round 19 ddec x3 3 sts copyright 2024 lily kate france for personal use only pattern & items made from pattern may not be reproduced for sale
